ISSUE.TITLE: GetOrderTotalDiscountAsync, GetOrderSubtotalDiscountAsync, GetShippingDiscountAsync performance
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: all Steps to reproduce the problem: change if (allDiscounts != null) line to if (allDiscounts != null) to if (allDiscounts != null && allDiscounts.Any())

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7145 Minor changes in GetOrderTotalDiscountAsync, GetOrderSubtotalDiscountAsync, GetShippingDiscountAsync
